name: Pion
tagline: A small, hackable browser created with JS and Electron.
body:
# Pion

Pion is a small, hackable browser created with JS and Electron. Pion is designed for developers, containing several unique features, such as native support for HTML5 outlining.

You can find instructions for installing Pion [here](https://github.com/BookOwl/pion-browser/wiki/Installing)

# Credits
Pion is forked from a sample Electron web browser created by @hokein

The HTML5 outlining module was created by @dominykas
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
